alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; Iberville; West Baton Rouge (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 31 at 4:30PM CDT until July 31 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern West Baton Rouge Parish in southeastern Louisiana... East central Iberville Parish in southeastern Louisiana... South central East Baton Rouge Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 429 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Westminster, or over Oak Hills Place, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Plaquemine, Oak Hills Place, St. Gabriel, Westminster, Old Jefferson, Village St. George, Inniswold, Shenandoah, Gardere, Carville and Merrydale. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 156 and 168. Interstate 12 between mile markers 1 and 7. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; Iberville; West Baton Rouge
